arts.ttl: Celtic 4-0 Falkirk – St Martin of Parkhead as Hearts Start to Falter
arts.sum: St Martin of Parkhead as Hearts Start to Falter… Martin O’Neill enjoyed a glorious return to Paradise as his revamped Celtic side hammered Falkirk, 4-0. The ongoing internal war was far removed from the mind of the venerated Irishman as he brought joy back to the faithful on a night where it could have all Read More

arts.ttl: Celtic 4 Falkirk 0: How Martin O'Neill ensured he enjoyed triumphant Parkhead return
arts.sum: Martin O’Neill oversaw an emphatic win over Falkirk on his return to Parkhead tonight and helped Celtic to reduce Hearts' lead to six points.

arts.ttl: Martin O'Neill gives Celtic a boot up the backside as champions dominate Falkirk - 5 talking points
arts.sum: Hoops fans chanted his name and the boss delivered on his emotional return

arts.ttl: O'Neill makes winning Celtic return against Falkirk
arts.sum: Martin O'Neill made the perfect return to Celtic as he led them to a much-needed 4-0 victory against Falkirk in the wake of Brendan Rodgers' shock departure.

arts.ttl: CELTIC 4 FALKIRK 0: KENNY DOUBLE AS O’NEILL CELEBRATES COMEBACK
arts.sum: CELTIC 4 FALKIRK 0 IRISH eyes were smiling at Parkhead tonight. Martin O’Neill enjoyed a winning return to Paradise in his first game in charge in two decades. And it was Republic of Ireland Under-21 international striker Johnny Kenny who helped ease the nerves of the 73-year-old interim manager with a first-half double to make [...]

arts.ttl: Kieran Tierney absent for Falkirk clash sparking Rangers fears
arts.sum: Kieran Tierney was absent from the Celtic squad to face Falkirk sparking fitness concerns for the weekend. The Scotland Internationalist has struggled with injuries throughout his career and appeared to pull-up towards the end of Celtic’s defeat at Tynecastle. In Martin O’Neill’s first team sheet since returning as interim manager, there was a noticeable absence Read More

arts.ttl: Team’s Up – John McGlynn names Falkirk XI for Celtic clash
arts.sum: Falkirk manager John McGlynn has named his team for this evening’s Premiership clash with Celtic. McGlynn, who worked under Brendan Rodgers at Celtic, has impressed with Falkirk, who currently sit sixth in the table. McGlynn names ex-Celtic goalkeeper Scott Gain in nets as the Bairns will look to spoil Martin O’Neill’s Celtic Park homecoming. Falkirk: Read More

arts.ttl: Team’s Up – Martin O’Neill names Celtic team for Falkirk test
arts.sum: Martin O’Neill has named his Celtic team ahead of this evening’s Scottish Premiership match with Falkirk. The Scottish Champions appointed O’Neill as interim manager following Brendan Rodgers’ shock departure on Monday. Now, O’Neill and Shaun Maloney have named their first starting XI for the must win against the visitors. In goals, Kasper Schmeichel starts. In Read More

arts.ttl: Celtic vs Falkirk LIVE score and goal updates as Martin O'Neill returns to Parkhead
arts.sum: Life without Brendan Rodgers begins for the faltering champions as O'Neill and Shaun Maloney make a stunning return

arts.ttl: Celtic v Falkirk- Make Some Noise for The Bhoys
arts.sum: Let’s make some noise for the Bhoys… Tonight sees Celtic take on Falkirk at Celtic Park, and it’s fair to say that it is a hugely important game after two league defeats on the spin against Dundee and Hearts, but even more so due to events that have unfolded in the last 48 hours.
